apps.title: Breaking News
apps.description: # Breaking News: Your Global News Hub Stay ahead of the curve and never miss a beat with **Breaking News**, your ultimate source for the latest, most reliable news from around the globe. Trusted by millions, this app delivers up-to-the-minute updates on global events, sports, finance, entertainment, and more—all in one convenient place. ## Effortless Access We believe staying informed should be simple. With **Breaking News**, there’s no need for registration or personal information. Just download the app and dive straight into the world of breaking news! ## Intuitive Navigation Explore the news with ease. Our sleek, user-friendly interface puts the latest headlines front and center, offering a seamless and enjoyable browsing experience every time. ## Tailored to You Make the news your own. Customize your sources in the **Settings** menu to focus on what matters most to you. Plus, stay in the loop with real-time push notifications as stories unfold. ## Trusted Sources Get updates from the best in the business. **Breaking News** brings you real-time coverage from top outlets like **CNN**, **Fox News**, **Reuters**, **The New York Times**, **CNBC**, and more—delivered straight to your device. ## Beyond Breaking News Go deeper with hourly newscasts and podcasts from leading providers like **NPR**, **BBC**, **CBC**, **ABC**, **CBS**, **ESPN**, **VOA**, **RTHK**, **DW**, **Marketplace**, and **FOX News**. Stay informed on the go with audio updates tailored to your interests. ## Take Control of Your News Download **Breaking News** today and empower yourself with accurate, real-time information from the world’s most reliable outlets. Whether you’re a news junkie, a podcast lover, or just want to stay in the know, this app has everything you need—wherever life takes you. Start exploring now! Legal Disclaimer —————————————————— Breaking News is an independent app and is not affiliated with or endorsed by any of the included news sources. All rights are reserved by the respective owners.

Personalized Canadian & World News – Whether it’s local news from cities like Toronto, Vancouver, Calgary, or Ottawa, or global updates on politics, business, health, and more, follow the stories you care about. 2. 24/7 Live Coverage – Watch the news unfold in real-time on 7+ channels, including "CTV National News" with Omar Sachedina and Sandie Rinaldo. 3. Video Highlights – Watch the day’s top stories in quick videos, so you’re always up to date. 3. apps.title: BuzzFeed - Quiz, Trivia & News
apps.description: BuzzFeed is the place for celebrity buzz, trivia, quizzes, shopping, games, and trending news that matters! The BuzzFeed app has it all: • Catch up on pop culture, trending entertainment and celebrity news • Read the funniest and wildest tweets and stories from across the Internet • Shop smarter with our Shopping recommendations to buy gifts for friends — or yourself! • Play word, trivia, and AI games in our Games Tab • Test your trivia knowledge or take a quiz that reveals something about you in the Quiz tab More on quizzes: • Find out who you are with our personality quizzes! Whether it’s a Disney princess, Gilmore Girls character, or one of Marvel’s Avengers, our quizzes are eerily accurate! See if we can guess your age too! • Take a trivia quiz to see how your trivia knowledge compares to other BuzzFeed quiz takers, and share your trivia results with friends! We let you know if you’re a trivia star by quizzing you on if you really are smarter than a fifth grader or know as much trivia as Jeopardy contestants. More on shopping: • Can’t find the perfect gift, or the perfect item for yourself? Our shopping recommendations provide ideas for beauty products, technology, apparel, household supplies, and more! • Not ready to buy? Save your favorite items for later in our shopping Wish List! More on news and entertainment: • Catch up with your favorite celebrities and pop culture moments. • Find all the coverage you want of your favorite TV and movies, from hot trending series on Disney+ and Netflix to your old favorites like the Office and Friends! • Take a news break and enjoy our social media roundups of the best posts from Twitter and Reddit! More on app features: • Bookmark your favorite trivia quizzes or news articles to return to later! • Join the BuzzFeed community to comment on what’s buzzing in the celebrity and pop culture world. • Get push notifications for breaking news or the big story that everyone’s ready. Reviews: “One site with just about EVERYTHING. No joke. News, trivia, fun videos, dating/health tips, recipes, and fact-filled articles you never knew you needed to read.” - DannyA3579 “It is the young people's New York Times, I love it.” - *-Clay-* “It's both entertaining and informative, and probably has better news credibility than both Fox and CNN combined.” - ​​vertrell “Combines CNN and E! News and more. I get all my news here.” - lolaw1225 “It's my morning routine… almost a combination of TMZ and the news all in one app.” - margaretwp If you have any trouble with your app please email us at support@buzzfeed.com so we can help! If you'd like to delete your buzzfeed.com account, log in on desktop and go to the user settings menu, then tap Delete My Account. Deleting your account will irreversibly delete your account details. Your posts will be removed from public view (we will keep an internal copy for compliance purposes), and your username will be removed from your comments (but your comments will remain visible, so you should edit/delete them before deleting your account). Deleting your account will not unsubscribe you from any email lists you’ve signed up for (see the emails for unsubscribe instructions) and will not delete your account on other BuzzFeed platforms (please log into your account on that platform). This app may contain contextually-served ads, which are targeted based on the subject matter of the content, where they are placed, and are not based on user behavior data. Note: Our properties may also feature Nielsen's proprietary measurement software which may contribute to market research, like Nielsen's TV Ratings. Nielsen's software may collect your choices with regards to it. Privacy Policy: https://www.buzzfeed.com/about/privacy User Agreement: https://www.buzzfeed.com/about/useragreement

apps.title: WION News- Live World News
apps.description: The official WION News app helps you have the world at your feet - quite literally. Not only does it brings the international news updates to the common Indian reader, it also takes India far and wide -- to other countries and continents. Be it Latest U.S Headlines, Political Views, US Entertainment News & Gossips or USA Sports News, you name it, and you get it here on the WION news app. The Breaking News alert feature helps you get to know of any major event as and when it happens -- in any part of the world. This world news app works in conjunction with the WION news channel -- a first-of-its-kind 'global' news channel. With its special focus on South Asia the WION news channel takes the region to the West, and vice-versa. With the LIVE TV option on the app, you can watch Live News coverage of major events on the app. Get the best of the WION news channel -- Gravitas -- on your fingertips. The WION app also brings to you some of the best articles, analyses and commentary, and opinion pieces written by trusted and superlative news editors and columnists. Fast and accurate updates on the WION news app will ensure that you find the World's latest news, US Top headlines, Hollywood News, US Trending News on your fingertips. The app is built especially for iOS devices. WHAT YOU GET WHEN YOU DOWNLOAD THE WION APP : * Breaking News developments, News from the World, South Asia, and latest political issues * Get engaging and entertaining news stories from Hollywood, Bollywood and theatre space * Live coverage from News, Sports, Technology, Entertainment events * Latest news in form of images and videos including ground reports from Washington. * Business news, latest updates from Economy, Market and Industry * Science news, latest discoveries, news and updates about space-related stories and other discoveries from around the world * Technology news, Gadget and Smartphone Reviews, Apps and Social media news * International news, Viral and Trending stories from around the world TOP FEATURES OF THE WION APP INCLUDE: * Live TV: Never miss a news update. Watch WION news channel anytime, anywhere * Customised home screen: Select sections of your interest to appear on your home screen. You can even reorder them according to your preference * Next story: Read the next story conveniently by just swiping left * Share news: Share articles, photos and videos via Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, WhatsApp, e-mail and SMS text messages * Manage notifications: Select the categories you want to receive notifications for * Mark favourite : You can bookmark articles, videos and photos so that you can later come back to them * Offline reading: You need not worry when you don't have internet access. Use this feature to read news even when you are offline * Videos: Browse through a selection of most informative and entertaining video clips * Photos: Photo galleries and slideshows on latest news, entertainment, sports, business and lifestyle Download the official WION app today to get the exhaustive news coverage by WION's large network, and to easily access latest news, features, photos, videos from India and across the world on your smartphones. The app is built for iOS devices. For more info visit our Website : https://www.wionews.com/ and follow us on : * Twitter - https://twitter.com/WIONews * Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/WIONews

apps.title: The Times of India - News App
apps.description: The official Times of India news app brings you the latest news-reading experience on the go. Keeping you informed on breaking news & events like T20 World Cup from India & around the World. Download the TOI app on your device & read the news, watch live TV, check out photos, trending videos & more from across the globe - anywhere, anytime! The TOI App offers the latest news from India & World in 14 languages including English, Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam, Bengali, Gujarati, Kannada, Punjabi, Nepali & more. The TOI app presents everything that an avid news reader is looking for – breaking news, latest headlines, trending stories, & in-depth coverage of sports, entertainment, business, & technology. From India to the World news, Political to Sports news, Technology to Bollywood news & movie reviews, your daily hunt for all kinds of news at one place ends with us. No more FOMO with trending celebrity gossip with the dedicated Entertainment news section. TOI app presents news available in shorts as photo gallery, visual stories, photo story of famous Bollywood celebrities, industrialists, politicians, sportspersons & events/parties that are trending. Also catch the live news coverage of all the trending headlines on Times Now Live TV & Times Now Live Audio. Introducing TOI+ subscription- • With the TOI+ subscription you get a premium reading experience with daily exclusive stories, and expert opinions. • Get unlimited access to well-researched and exclusive stories for 1 year as a paid auto-renewing subscription through an In-App Purchase. • Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew each year, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. • Your current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase. • Privacy policy: https://www.indiatimes.com/privacypolicy • Terms & Conditions - https://www.indiatimes.com/termsandcondition QUICK GLANCE AT THE FEATURES OF TOI APP • Briefs – For those who read the news in a hurry, enjoy their news to be in short and crisp format and stay updated with the latest news on the go, quick! • Morning and Evening Updates – Get updates every morning & evening and catch up on the latest news and trending headlines with our smart updates feature. • Live TV – Watch as it happens! Catch the live coverage of all kinds of breaking news- business, Bollywood news on Times Now, ET Now, Zoom Live TV and Mirror Now TV along with audio, right in the app! Please note Live TV channels are geocentric and may not be available across all countries. • My Feed – Receive customised feeds as per language preference from The Times of India & other regional publishers • Personalize your App with Manage home tabs, create your own news reading experience according to your preferences. • Customize Notifications – You can not only choose to control the time and frequency of your notifications but also receive them based on your interests! • Night Mode Reading – Don’t stress your eyes anymore! Use the Black theme built in the app to have a pleasant reading experience even in poor lighting conditions. • Fonts – Choose a font size that enhance and ensures seamless news reading experience. • Share – Like a story? Share it with your friends and loved ones using Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Email & more! We always love to hear from our readers! Share your love with comments and suggestions to toi.iphone@timesinternet.in

apps.title: South China Morning Post: News
apps.developer: South China Morning Post Publishers Limited
apps.description: The South China Morning Post (SCMP) has been the most authoritative voice reporting on China and Asia for more than a century. As Hong Kong’s English-language newspaper of record, our international team of Asia experts, reporters, journalists, photographers and filmmakers are dedicated to providing breaking news and analysis from Hong Kong, China and beyond. Our unique home base of Hong Kong allows us to have in-depth understanding of the China story from an insider’s perspective, while enjoying a high level of press freedom and independence granted by the city’s special constitutional principle of “One country, two systems”. Today, our dedication to representing the region with our editorial motto, “truth and fairness” is more relevant than ever before. Our new app is our biggest app update ever. The update lets you explore curated content tailored to your news interests with My News, and informs you on the stories that matter to you with the redesigned top menu that allows you customise your reading preferences. AWARD-WINNING JOURNALISM Download the South China Morning Post app and receive instant access to the SCMP’s award-winning journalism including coverage of the latest breaking news, both regionally and globally, including: US-China trade war and tech war, Trump vs Xi Jinping, the Hong Kong National Security law, Hong Kong protests and electoral changes, China military, South China Sea news, China’s relations with the EU, India and Australia, health and wellness, fashion and lifestyle updates, climate change and much much more. KEY FEATURES Breaking news alerts, tailored to your interests, including exclusives, explainers, live coverage and developing stories Focus View, a personalised content discovery feature that keeps you informed on what matters to you Article bookmarking to save your favourite features and articles Follow your favourite topic/author with myNEWS and get five daily stories curated for you, plus a personalised feed of our most popular content Customisable bottom navigation, so you can add, remove and rearrange your favourite sections with ease Tailored top menu for seamless browsing of your preferred topics Listen-to-article feature so you can listen to stories on the go (subscriber-only) CONTENT AND COVERAGE Keep informed with the latest Hong Kong and China headlines, opinion pieces, plus stories from the rest of the world Full access to all SCMP content, including publications such as Post Magazine, This Week in Asia and Style Full access to SCMP’s award-winning journalism including Hong Kong news, China news, Asia news, Business, Politics, Economy, Lifestyle, Tech, Health, and Sports Wide-range of regional topics from our Asia experts including North Korea, South China Sea tensions, China’s Economy, Belt and Road, K-pop, as-well-as a spotlight on China’s tech-giants such as Tencent, Baidu, Bytedance, and Alibaba, Huawei and Xiaomi Explore new ways to discover our insightful, unique content and current issues with SCMP Films, SCMP Spotlight and SCMP Podcasts, plus video, infographics, pictures and special reports TERMS OF USE All content in the South China Morning Post is copyright South China Morning Post Publishers Ltd 2020. All rights reserved. Terms of use and privacy policy apply when accessing content via the South China Morning Post app. Privacy policy: https://www.scmp.com/privacy-policy Terms and conditions: https://www.scmp.com/terms-conditions Feedback and Enquiries: If you have questions or concerns, please contact us at support@scmp.com or (852) 2565 9388. Your feedback is important to us. If you have any suggestions for how we can improve the app please email us. Support: The app has been designed to run on iPhone 7 and above and on OS versions 11 and above.

apps.title: ABC13 Houston News & Weather
apps.description: The ABC13 app provides the latest breaking news and weather with alerts customized for you! Get more live video than ever before with the 24/7 live stream. HOME - ABC13's 24/7 live stream is always near the top of the app - Breaking news and weather alerts also appear at the top of the screen - Stay up-to-date on the biggest stories happening in the Houston area and beyond WATCH - All of ABC13's live streams are available in one place - Looking for videos that aired in a newscast or entire newscasts you might have missed? Find those under the "videos" tab - Use picture in picture to watch video while you use other apps on your phone EXPLORE - Find a news story by entering a keyword into the search bar - Browse news by topic, including 13 Investigates, Texas True Crime, Localish and more! WEATHER - Easily choose your locations to get hourly conditions and 7-day forecast - Get real-time Doppler maps along with detailed weather information - Get weather and traffic alerts for severe conditions so you’re always up-to-date before you go MY NEWS - Stay informed on stories that matter to you by choosing topics you care about -“My News” builds a unique feed just for you based on interests and locations you choose - Choose customized alerts for topics and locations you care about, from entertainment news to sports updates and everything in between Your California Privacy Rights - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-california-privacy-rights/ Do Not Sell My Information - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/dnsmi Before you download this app, please consider that it includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests. apps.title: The Hindu : India & World News
apps.description: Stay updated with The Hindu News app, the definitive source for breaking news and comprehensive coverage from India and the world. Whether it's political news, business updates, cricket and other sports coverage, latest technology updates, or current events, The Hindu delivers live, accurate and reliable news directly to your device. Don’t fall for sensationalised or fake news shared online. Read and share accurate updates with friends and family through The Hindu News app. Download it today! News Coverage Breaking News Get instant notifications on breaking news stories as they happen. No matter where you live, you can be the first to know about major events and developments from Indian shores and around the globe with express live blogs and articles. Politics Stay informed about the latest political news updates India, including elections, policy changes, government decisions, and political events. Business and Economy Understand the economic landscape with our detailed business news analysis. From market trends to financial reports, stay updated on the latest Market & Business News, India News, Stock Market, Finance, Sensex - BSE India, Nifty- NSE India, economy and corporate news. Learn about shares and make informed decisions before investing your money. Current Events Follow stories on social issues, policy changes, significant global events and daily current affairs for UPSC and other competitive exam preparations. Technology Stay ahead of the times with updates of India’s latest gadgets, innovations, and tech trends from around the globe. Read reviews, analyses, and news on innovations and cutting-edge technology. Sports Follow your favourite sports and teams with our extensive sports coverage. Get live scores, match reports, and expert analysis on cricket, football, tennis, and more. International News Get a global perspective with news from around the world. Keep yourself updated on the latest geopolitical events from Russia-Ukraine war, Israel-Palestine conflict. Local News Get latest city news and updates on local events, issues, and community news that matter to you, With hyperlocal news coverage coming from Bangalore, Chennai, Delhi, Hyderabad, Mumbai, Kolkata and many other cities. Trending Topics Stay updated on what's trending today. Discover the most talked-about stories, trending news and engage with current hot topics. ABOUT THE PUBLISHER: THG PUBLISHING PRIVATE LIMITED: Today, The Hindu Group has a slew of print and digital publications. Some of the top publications include: The Hindu (English news daily) The Hindu ePaper & Businessline ePaper Businessline (Business daily) Frontline (Fortnightly national magazine) Sportstar (Sports magazine) SUBSCRIPTIONS • The Hindu premium access is now available as recurring subscriptions that renew after the durations of 1 month (₹299 / $4.99), and 1 year (₹2399/$49.99). The All Access Pass, which gives your premium access to not only The Hindu and its epaper but also BusinessLine, Frontline and Sportstar, is also available as recurring subscriptions charged every 1 month (₹399 / $7.99), and 1 year (₹2799 / $79.99). • Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. • Current subscription may not be cancelled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase Support mail: support@thehindu.com The Hindu Group’s Privacy Policy: https://www.thehindugroup.com/privacy.html The Hindu Group's terms of use: https://www.thehindu.com/termsofuse/ Apple’s standard end user license agreement (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: NBC10 Philadelphia: Local News
apps.description: The NBC10 Philadelphia news and weather app connects you with all things Philly. It is your gateway to local news, weather updates, and a free NBC10 Philadelphia News 24/7 streaming channel. The app is free to download and easy to use, offering customizable breaking news alerts and weather notifications tailored to your location through convenient app settings. With this app, you tap into the expertise of the award-winning NBC10 Philadelphia news team, covering the issues vital to residents in Greater Philadelphia, the Lehigh Valley, South Jersey, and Delaware. The NBC10 First Alert weather meteorologists provide accurate local forecasts, ensuring app users stay informed wherever they go. Experience a comprehensive range of features, including powerful weather radar, local traffic updates, NBC Sports Philadelphia news, live coverage of developing stories in Philly and beyond, as well as updates on entertainment, lifestyle, business, and financial insights – all consolidated in one user-friendly app. The NBC10 Philadelphia app helps you stay informed with the following features: PHILLY NEWS ALERTS + Alerts for Philly local news, breaking news, sports, commuter alerts, and other alerts that can be personalized and managed in the app settings +Top News of the day covering breaking news, local Philly politics, urgent consumer product recalls and other topics + Latest news feed that shows all articles and videos published in reverse chronological order + Alerts center that shows you the most urgent Philly news stories of the day that you might’ve missed if you didn’t click on push notifications +Trending section where you can discover daily, buzz-worthy topics in Philly news and pop culture NBC10 PHILADELPHIA FIRST ALERT WEATHER + Customizable weather home screen with weather modules you can rearrange + Upgraded location hub to add new locations and set up weather alerts + Live Philly weather updates from the StormRanger10 mobile tracking radar + 10-day forecasts for your location in Greater Philadelphia, the Lehigh Valley, South Jersey or Delaware + Hourly forecasts featuring a customizable graph + Local weather maps and radar + Local weather forecast data that includes UV index, air quality and other live weather conditions + Weather alerts for every location you save in the app + Weather closings for Philly area schools + Weather news videos from your local meteorologists NBC10 PHILADELPHIA NEWS 24/7 STREAMING CHANNEL + Free 24/7 NBC Philadelphia news streaming channel + Live NBC10 Philadelphia newscasts + Breaking news live coverage of news briefings and other urgent news events in the Philly area + Dedicated video page with the latest video feed NBC PHILADELPHIA I-TEAM INVESTIGATIONS & MORE + Investigative stories from local and award-winning NBC10 journalists + Consumer reports from NBC10 Responds fight to recoup consumers’ hard-earned money + Sports news from NBC Sports Philadelphia + Business news, finance news and stock market news from CNBC + Entertainment news from E! Online and Access + Lifestyle and entertainment news from NBC TODAY show NBC10 Philadelphia is part of the NBCUniversal Local group, which includes ten other NBC stations, 17 Telemundo Stations, four regional sports networks, including NBC Sports Philadelphia, and NECN (New England Cable News). NBC10 (WCAU) has been providing news and entertainment to the Delaware Valley for nearly 70 years. Your Privacy Choices: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo?brandA=Owned_Stations&intake=NBC_10_Philadelphia/ CA Notice: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act?intake=NBC_10_Philadelphia

apps.title: BBC World Service
apps.description: The official BBC World Service news app by Zeno Media LLC offers the latest programmes and news headlines from the BBC World Service. You can to listen to the latest radio programmes using the free audio player or by using the telephone dial-up option (standard geographic mobile charges will apply. Please check with your provider for exact costs before calling). - Read the latest news headlines from the BBC World Service website - Listen to your favorite radio programmes free with the audio player, or by using the standard-rate telephone dial-up service. - You can listen to the most recent editions of: - The Global News Podcast - Newshour - HARDtalk - Sport Today - Business Daily - Focus on Africa, and many more For EU users only: If you choose to receive customized ads, a unique identifier (Google Advertising ID or Apple’s ID for Advertising) relating to your device will be stored by Zeno Media to provide you with the service and allow customized advertising to be served within the app. No other Personal Data relating to you (such as a username or email address) is processed. Such information will only be processed in line with Zeno Media’s Privacy Policy, available at https://www.zenomedia.com/wp-content/themes/zeno/privacy_policy.pdf Find out about your privacy rights and the BBC’s Privacy and Cookies Policy at http://www.bbc.co.uk/privacy. Notifications may include alerts, sounds and icon badges. These can be reconfigured in Settings (notifications). Details of data this app collects, including the unique identifier relating to your device and your location data, is also found under Settings.

apps.title: NDTV News App
apps.description: The NDTV App is now iOS26 Compatible! You can access news in English, Hindi, Marathi, stories from NDTV Profit, all in a single app! Stay in touch with the latest and breaking news from India. Also read and watch live news from around the world, as it happens. From news in politics to sports, opinions, blogs, entertainment, technology, business; you can read, watch live tv or view our Photo-galleries to keep yourself updated. City and State News from across India is also readily available on the news app Our news app is available on iPhone, iPad and MacOS with NDTV Premium for no extra cost! NDTV News - • Beeps: AI Generated, Newsroom reviewed: Bite size summary of the days Top Stories and breaking news • Switch between the India or World Edition • Live Coverage of Lok Sabha Elections, General Elections and Elections around the World • Read News, Opinions, Analysis, from Indian cities and around the world • Receive alerts on breaking news, latest news, india news, sports, entertainment, technology and more. You may also customise the categories you wish to be receive notifications for • Add widgets from NDTV to your home screen or lock screen. You may choose from a variety of widgets providing you the latest news in 3 different formats and/or our Infographics widget to keep you updated • Add quick access to the news app from the device control panel (accessible on iOS18+) • Listen to news podcasts of your favourite shows: Ctrl Alt Defence, Knuckleball, Unplan Life and more • Watch Top Shows from NDTV Anchors - Shiv Aroor, Padmaja Joshi, Vedika Sun, Vishnu Som, Vasudha Venugopal, T M Veeraraghav, Syed Sohail, Sumit Awasthi, Sikta Deo, Naghma, Shubhankar Mishra, Gargi Rawat and more! • Tech 360 with Aayush Ailawadi • Full coverage of General Elections, budget and other important news and sporting events from various cities, across the country • Movie reviews, entertainment news, tv features, trailers, gossip and more • Coverage of sporting events from Cricket, Football, F1, Badminton and much more • Match updates and live scorecard for IPL, Women's World Cup, T-20 World Cup and more • Business news, stocks and more with NDTV Profit Live Video & Audio Stream • NDTV 24x7 - English News • NDTV India/NDTV Khabar - Hindi News • NDTV Marathi - Marathi News • NDTV Profit - Business and Stocks • NDTV Rajasthan • NDTV MP-CG - Madhya Pradesh and Chhattisgarh News NDTV Premium • Completely ad-free • Access to high quality Live TV streams for our news channels • Option to play audio in the background while you continue browsing • Your subscription will automatically renew each month or year, and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings. Please note: This app is completely free to use. Upgrading to Premium is optional NDTV Apple Watch App • Get notified about breaking news, latest stories and more! • Live cricket updates shown on the watch during matches • Stock updates during market hours Terms & Conditions: http://drop.ndtv.com/ndtv/apps/pages/premium-terms.html Privacy Policy: http://drop.ndtv.com/ndtv/apps/pages/privacy-policy.html

apps.title: The Athletic: All Sports News
apps.description: Keep up with the teams you care about with The Athletic app. Review sports news, scores and stats, and expert insights analysis for each league. Turn on notifications to get real time updates for basketball, football, soccer, hockey, baseball, and more. Get in depth with sports coverage when you can listen to exclusive podcasts and read breaking news stories on your favorite athletes and teams. Download today to stay up to date on your daily sports news. The Athletic Features: EXCLUSIVE SPORTS NEWS, INSIGHTS, AND ANALYSIS - Go deeper with in-depth, global coverage and exclusive sports news. - Our award-winning newsroom of more than 400 sports journalists. - Get exclusive access to expert sports insights and analysis. - Explore deeply-reported long reads and exclusive sports interviews. SPORTS SCORES AND STATS ON ALL MAJOR TEAMS AND LEAGUES - Discover the top sports stories of the day, breaking news and live score updates, all from the biggest names in sports writing. - Access exclusive coverage on professional and college teams across football, hockey, basketball, soccer and beyond, - Find sports updates for the United States and international sports. - Follow your favorites so you never miss sports scores or stats. UNMATCHED SPORTS PODCASTS: - Follow and listen to a variety of sports podcasts on your favorite leagues - Discover daily podcasts like “The Athletic Football Show”, “The Audible” and “No Dunks”. CONNECTIONS: SPORTS EDITION - Play The Athletic’s daily game for sports fans. - Group sports terms that share a common thread. STAY UP TO DATE ON YOUR SPORTS: - Keep track of which NFL teams are in contention for the playoffs and follow to see if the Eagles can remain on top. - Catch all the MLB action with live scores, breaking news and in-depth coverage to see if the Dodgers can repeat their World Series win. - Stay up to date on all NHL hockey scores, games and news for the Stanley Cup Defending Oilers. - Don’t miss any NBA highlights and news from this upcoming season and see if the Thunder can defend their NBA Championship win. - What school will reign supreme from March Madness to the NCAA Football Championships? Don’t miss a score or stat update. - Stay updated on every swing from the PGA Tour to see who can stay in the lead. - Who in the Big Six will triumph in the Premier League this year, and can Liverpool defend their title? - Follow Argentina, Spain and France as they compete for the FIFA World Cup next summer. - Stay up to speed on Formula 1, NASCAR, Indy Car, MotoGP and World Rally. apps.title: Way2News - Short News App
apps.description: Way2News is India’s largest Hyperlocal Infotainment App that provides local news updates in vernacular languages in a short-summarized format. We are trusted by crores of Indians. You can flip through interesting stories from various categories in eight Indian languages -Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Hindi, Marathi, Bengali, Malayalam,& Gujarati. Don’t Have Much Time But Want To Stay Updated With What's Happening Around You? We provide you with the popular and important stories happening in your locality. Never miss a story as we offer a wide range of categories to keep you entertained and help you stay up-to-date with the current happenings in the world. Simple & short news that made way2news - celebrities & politicians’ favorite news app. Main functionalities in the app: Bookmarks - save stories you don't have time to read, for later Dark mode - available for all devices Flip to read - Minute by minute local news updates. From notifying you with the latest job alerts to providing you with the latest updates in technology, sports, entertainment, and the business world, you can choose which topics matter most to you. Local Information Is Our Core Stay updated with current affairs and 24*7 daily events from your state, district, Mandal/Taluk, and village. You can also share your content & write short stories. Tailored Video Content Find the most shared, informative & unique videos every day based on your interests. To save your time, we’ve also introduced short videos on the app. Job Alerts: Are you looking for a job? If yes, we have them all covered for you. Get the latest job alerts, and local job updates, including, part-time jobs and fresher's job openings. There’s a special category for 10th pass jobs, 12th pass jobs, UG jobs, diploma jobs, etc. Entertainment: Keep up with the latest entertainment and cinema updates, and flip through interesting celebrity gossip exclusively on our app. Get to know more about the upcoming movies/new cinema releases, web series, and trending teasers/trailers from Bollywood, Tollywood, Kollywood, Mollywood, and the Indian cinema industry. Daily Digital Magazine Get your daily dose of digital magazines to get a clear insight on various topics. From health, Business, Women's world, career, agriculture, travel, real estate, food, & Sunday special magazines. We also publish an exclusive magazine for kids every day. We curate content for you that is easy to read and understand. Daily Horoscopes & Astrology Get your daily horoscope of all zodiac signs on love, career, family, wealth, and more. The daily astrology is free and helps you learn what the day has in store for you. Live Cricket Updates: Keep up to date with the latest cricket fixtures with live updates and highlights. apps.title: TuneIn Radio: Music & Sports
apps.description: Listen to All the Audio You Love, All in One Place Access over 100,000 live AM/FM radio stations from around the world, plus exclusive content from news, sports, music, podcasts, and audiobooks—all across your devices. Enjoy a broader range of audio than Pandora or iHeartRadio, all in one place. Your Personalized Soundtrack Tune in to your favorite live stations or explore 100,000+ AM/FM stations from 197+ countries. Whether you’re in the mood for Today’s Hits, Classic Rock, Smooth Jazz, or something else, TuneIn has you covered—offering more variety and control than platforms like Pandora or iHeartRadio. Discover legendary stations like 106.7 Lite FM, Power 105.1, 102.7 KIIS-FM, and more. Apple Music Radio now on TuneIn Apple Music Radio has landed. Stream Apple Music 1, Chill, Country, Club & Hits live on TuneIn. Catch your favorite artists like Billie Eilish, Ed Sheeran, The Weeknd, Frank Ocean and more. Stay Informed with Trusted News Get the latest headlines and live updates from top news sources like CNN, FOX News Radio, MSNBC, Bloomberg Radio, CNBC, NPR, and BBC. Access 24/7 news, including local, national, and global coverage. Stream news stations such as WNYC-FM, KQED-FM, and WTOP Washington DC, or stay informed with top podcasts like The Daily and Up First. All Your Favorite Sports From MLB and NFL to NHL and college sports, catch every game and never miss a play. With TuneIn, follow your team all season long with curated content and game-time notifications. Stream sports talk stations like ESPN Radio, talkSPORT, Fox Sports Radio, and local shows. Plus, enjoy on-demand sports podcasts like Undisputed, First Take, and The Bill Simmons Podcast. Podcasts for Every Passion Explore the world’s most popular podcasts, including Stuff You Should Know, Hidden Brain, Wow in the World, and more. Whether commuting, working out, or unwinding, TuneIn offers top global podcasts that you can stream on-demand. Stream Everywhere, Anytime Take TuneIn with you wherever you go. Listen on iOS, tablets, or connected devices. Control your audio experience with Amazon Alexa, Google Home, or in your car with CarPlay and compatible vehicles like Tesla, Mercedes, and Volvo. Unlock Even More with TuneIn Premium Upgrade to TuneIn Premium for ad-free content, exclusive features, and more: Live Sports: Commercial-free coverage of NHL games, college sports, racing, and more—without blackouts. Ad-Free News: Enjoy uninterrupted news coverage from CNBC, CNN, FOX News Radio, and more. Unlimited Audiobooks: Access over 100,000 audiobooks with no extra cost or limitations. Commercial-Free Music: Stream your favorite music stations non-stop with no ads. Fewer Ads Across All Stations: Enjoy listening to 100,000+ stations with fewer interruptions than Pandora or iHeartRadio. Subscribe to TuneIn Premium through the free app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a monthly or annual subscription fee according to your country. The subscription fee will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. Your subscription will automatically renew every month or year at the then-current subscription fee unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then-current subscription period. Your iTunes account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the then-current period. The subscription fee will be charged monthly or annually according to your subscription. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings. Privacy policy: http://tunein.com/policies/privacy/ Terms of use: http://tunein.com/policies TuneIn uses Nielsen measurement software which allows you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. To learn more about Nielsen’s products and your privacy, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

apps.title: Hindustan Times - Latest News
apps.description: Stay informed with the latest updates from Hindustan Times, India’s premier source for reliable news. With over 100 years of exemplary journalism since 1924, we bring you the fastest breaking news and comprehensive coverage on politics, business, entertainment, sports, and more. Whether you're looking for live updates or in-depth analysis, our platform offers a truly immersive reading experience. Why choose Hindustan Times? Our blend of editorial excellence and comprehensive coverage makes us the best news app in India. Our team of award-winning reporters and editors work tirelessly to provide unbiased, fact-checked reporting, ensuring you receive accurate news from the frontlines. With a personalized news feed based on your reading preferences, discover the content you care about, from live news to insightful columns and analysis. Expect comprehensive coverage with dedicated sections: - Politics & Governance: Stay updated on Parliament sessions, state elections, and policy changes. - National News: Access breaking news stories from all 28 states and 8 Union Territories. - World News: Understand international affairs, including US-India relations and global conflicts. - Business & Economy: Stay ahead with updates on stock markets, startups, and personal finance tips. - Technology: Discover the latest in AI, gadgets, and cybersecurity developments. - Sports: Follow cricket (IPL, international), football, and Olympic events closely. - Entertainment: Get the latest buzz on Bollywood, Hollywood, and OTT platforms. - Lifestyle: Explore articles on health, travel, food, and much more. - Cities: Enjoy hyperlocal news delivered directly from your city like Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru, and Kolkata. - Opinion & Analysis: Read expert columns and editorials from renowned journalists. Key features of the Hindustan Times app: - Live Breaking News Notifications: Get the fastest alerts for breaking news stories. - Personalized News Feed: Tailor your news consumption according to your interests. - Dark Mode: Enjoy comfortable reading during night hours. - Multimedia Content: Access video news, podcasts, and photo galleries. - Language Options: Experience the app in English, Bangla and Telgu - E-paper Access: Subscribers get exclusive access to the electronic version of the newspaper. - Ad-free Experience: Premium users enjoy reading without any interruptions. - Shareable Content: Easily share articles across your social networks. - Minimal Data Consumption: Fast loading times even with limited bandwidth. Trust our legacy of over a century in delivering quality journalism. With a team known for investigative excellence, we combat misinformation and deliver verified news. Each article is crafted with integrity to uphold our commitment to unbiased reporting. Join millions of readers and experience the future of news consumption. Download the Hindustan Times app today and enable notifications to never miss a beat. Our continued success and credibility stem from our rich heritage and global recognition in journalism. Explore the app to see why thousands trust Hindustan Times for their daily news updates. Download now and experience the robust features and trusted journalism that makes Hindustan Times the best news app in India. Stay connected to the stories that matter most. For any queries & suggestions, reach out at contact@hindustantimes.com Terms of uhttps://www.hindustantimes.com/termsofuse Privacy Policy: https://www.hindustantimes.com/privacy-policy Subscription-Terms of use: https://www.hindustantimes.com/subscriber-agreement-and-terms-of-use

Always stay up to date with the latest local news, national, sports, traffic, political, entertainment stories and much more. Download the WMUR News 9 app for free today. apps.title: theScore: Sports News & Scores
apps.description: Find out why millions of sports fans trust theScore as their number one sports app! theScore brings you news, scores, stats and videos from NFL Football, NBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball, MLB Baseball, NCAA Football, NHL Hockey, WNBA Basketball, English Premier League Soccer, La Liga Soccer, Champions League Soccer, PGA Golf - and every major league and competition! theScore delivers real-time scoring updates and alerts, breaking news, the deepest in-game stats, videos, and social content. theScore is fast, comprehensive, and super simple to use: *FAVORITES - This is YOUR personalized feed. All the content you care about from your favorite teams, players and leagues. Tap ‘Manage’ to add, delete or reorder your favorites. Never miss a key moment when you set-up your notifications! *SCORES - A live view of every game updated in real-time. Select the matchup for the full boxscore, including team and player stats, odds and lines, last plays, news, and more. *CHAT & MESSAGING - Who doesn’t like talking sports? Check out our cool chat and messaging features and connect with other fans around the leagues, teams and games you care about. *DISCOVER - Stay in the know on the biggest social stories and multimedia content that’s got sports fans talking! *NEWS - Get updated on the top headlines in an instant across all sports, including comprehensive fantasy analysis, and more. *LEAGUES - Check out the latest news, scores, standings, and leaders for all the sports you care about. theScore offers deep coverage and real-time alerts for every major league and competition, including: - Football (NFL Football, NCAA Football, and CFL Football, regular season and playoffs) - Baseball (College World Series and MLB Baseball, season play and playoffs) - Basketball (NBA Basketball, WNBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball - including the NCAA Men’s Basketball Tournament and playoffs) - Hockey (NHL Hockey, IIHF WJHC - World Junior Hockey Championship, NCAA Frozen Four) - Soccer (Premier League Soccer, Champions League, FIFA World Cup, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, - FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Ligue 1, Coppa Italia, Copa Del Rey and Liga MX, UEFA European Championships) - Golf (PGA, LPGA, Ryder Cup, European Tour, Web.com Tour) - Tennis (ATP, WTA), with the US Open coming in August - Mixed Martial Arts (MMA: UFC and Bellator) - Auto Racing (NASCAR Sprint Cup, Formula 1) - Lacrosse (NLL) __ Need help, have feedback or want to request a new feature? Contact us via the Settings menu or email us via support@thescore.com. You can also chat to us on Twitter via @theScoreHelp. Check out our cool chat and messaging features and connect with other fans around the leagues, teams and games you care about. *DISCOVER - Stay in the know on the biggest social stories and multimedia content that’s got sports fans talking! *NEWS - Get updated on the top headlines in an instant across all sports, including comprehensive fantasy analysis, and more. *LEAGUES - Check out the latest news, scores, standings, and leaders for all the sports you care about. theScore offers deep coverage and real-time alerts for every major league and competition, including: - Football (NFL Football, NCAA Football, and CFL Football, regular season and playoffs) - Baseball (College World Series and MLB Baseball, season play and playoffs) - Basketball (NBA Basketball, WNBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball - including the NCAA Men’s Basketball Tournament and playoffs) - Hockey (NHL Hockey, IIHF WJHC - World Junior Hockey Championship, NCAA Frozen Four) - Soccer (Premier League Soccer, Champions League, FIFA World Cup, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, - FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Ligue 1, Coppa Italia, Copa Del Rey and Liga MX, UEFA European Championships) - Golf (PGA, LPGA, Ryder Cup, European Tour, Web.com Tour) - Tennis (ATP, WTA), with the US Open coming in August - Mixed Martial Arts (MMA: UFC and Bellator) - Auto Racing (NASCAR Sprint Cup, Formula 1) - Lacrosse (NLL) __ Need help, have feedback or want to request a new feature? Contact us via the Settings menu or email us via support@thescore.com. You can also chat to us on Twitter via @theScoreHelp. apps.title: The Telegraph: UK & World News
apps.description: Stay ahead of breaking news in politics, sport and culture. Explore a range of tools and advice, from building your wealth to looking after your health. Keep your ear to the ground with Telegraph Podcasts, including the latest news from Ukraine, gripping investigations and the inside scoop on today’s biggest talking points. And train your brain with Telegraph Puzzles, like Sudoku, PlusWord, Panagram, Sorted and the Cryptic Crossword. Not yet a Telegraph Subscriber? Download the app now to try 14 days free – no payment details required. Follow the latest breaking news Stay ahead of the stories shaping our world, from News and Business to Politics and Sport. Visit the Latest section for breaking news headlines, as they unfold in the UK, US and around the world. Or tap Home to scroll through the day’s biggest stories, with live blogs, videos and photo galleries, plus free-thinking comment and in-depth analysis. Expert advice Make the best decisions for you and your family. Whether you’re managing your money, looking after your health, planning your next holiday or searching for the perfect school or university, you’ll find a range of practical, valuable advice from names you can trust. See how the latest news affects your plans – and learn how to turn it to your advantage. You’ll also find a wide range of useful tools and guides, to help you plan your next step with confidence. Read the daily digital newspaper Enjoy the digital editions of The Daily Telegraph and Sunday Telegraph anytime, anywhere. They're just like the printed editions of the newspaper, including all your favourite sections, supplements and magazines, like Telegraph Magazine. Every day’s edition of the newspaper is available from 5am. What's more, once you've downloaded your newspaper, you can browse it online or offline. So whether you’re travelling to work, need some food for thought over lunch, or you’re just relaxing at home, you’ll be able to read the full range of our unrivalled insight, expert tips and in-depth long reads. Stay ahead Set up notifications and never miss a moment, whether it’s a breaking news story, a major sporting event, the latest updates in business and finance, a must-read interview or opinion from your favourite journalists. Listen to podcasts Visit our Podcast Centre for a widely acclaimed range of audio-journalism. Listen to Ukraine: The Latest, get the inside track on the news in The Daily T, tune in to Planet Normal or listen to a gripping investigation, like Bed of Lies. Read subscriber-only newsletters Enjoy more from your favourite Telegraph journalists. Read a selection of their subscriber-only newsletters. Newsletters in the app include Matt’s weekly newsletter, Your Royal Appointment, Investor and Beyond Brexit Bulletin. Play Telegraph Puzzles Boost your mood and your brain power, wherever life takes you. Play games like the Mini Crossword, PlusWord, Panagram, Killer Sudoku and the Cryptic Crossword. Don’t have a Puzzles Subscription? Worry not, upgrading your access is quick and simple. Listen to award-winning podcasts such as The Explainer, Stardust and The Candidate in-app - Vote in our daily topical polls - Send a question to Ireland’s only verified FactCheck team - Submit story ideas to The Journal Investigates - apps.title: Spectrum News: Local Stories
apps.description: Spectrum News is your all-in-one destination for local news, weather forecasts and events. You let us know where you call home, and we customize your experience with stories and information that matter to you and your community. Available for all Spectrum customers.* If you’re not a Spectrum customer, enjoy free access for 30 days. GET HYPERLOCAL NEWS AND WEATHER • Read, watch and listen to curated news stories by our Spectrum News journalists and local partner publications. • Browse enhanced articles that help you understand local issues through original reporting, infographics, interactive maps, and much more. • Watch on demand videos and exclusive series that uncover meaningful stories. • Listen to original local podcasts that discuss what’s happening in your area. • Get the latest weather forecasts from our meteorologists and explore interactive radar maps. • Subscribe to weather notifications to get hyperlocal alerts based on your location. • Discover breaking news happening near you. • Stay up to date with the biggest events in your community and beyond. FOLLOW YOUR INTERESTS • Browse and follow topics you're interested in, including local politics, education, transit, health and more. • Curate your news experience to see more of what matters to you. WATCH SPECTRUM NEWS • Watch live news from Spectrum News’ portfolio of local news networks. • Spectrum News provides TV coverage in Kentucky, Massachusetts, New York City (NY1 & NY1 Noticias), New York State, North Carolina, Ohio, Central Florida (News 13), Southern California, Tampa (Bay News 9), Texas and Wisconsin. INTRODUCING SPECTRUM NEWS+ • Now watch the latest news from across the country. Local stories connecting communities. • Streaming free with your Spectrum subscription. • Find Spectrum News+ in the Spectrum News app. Your Privacy Rights: https://www.spectrum.com/policies/your-privacy-rights *Not currently available for SMB or enterprise customers or Spectrum customers receiving mobile service only.

apps.title: NBC LA: News, Weather, Live TV
apps.description: The NBC Los Angeles news and weather app connects you with local news, weather forecasts and breaking headlines throughout LA and Southern California. It is your gateway to local news, weather updates, and a free NBC Los Angeles News 24/7 streaming channel. The app is free to download and easy to use, offering customizable breaking news alerts and weather notifications tailored to your location through convenient app settings. The NBC Los Angeles app helps you stay informed with the following features: LOS ANGELES NEWS ALERTS + Alerts for LA local news, Southern California news, national headlines and world news that can be personalized and managed in the app settings + Top news of the day, covering breaking news, politics, weather, wildfires and earthquakes + Latest news feed that shows all articles and videos published in reverse chronological order + Alerts center that shows you the most urgent LA stories of the day that you might’ve missed if you didn’t click on push notifications +Trending section where you can discover daily, buzz-worthy topics in LA local news and pop culture NBC LA FIRST ALERT WEATHER + Customizable weather home screen with weather modules you can rearrange + Upgraded location hub to add new locations and set up weather alerts + Exclusive Live First Alert radar tracks storms in your neighborhood with our Live Doppler Network + Forecasts from our weather team alerting you to severe weather before it strikes + Hourly forecasts featuring a customizable graph + Detailed forecast data that includes UV index, air quality and other live weather conditions + Weather alerts for every location you see in the app + Complete weather closings for Los Angeles-area schools + Weather news videos from your local meteorologists NBC LOS ANGELES NEWS 24/7 STREAMING CHANNEL + Free 24/7 NBC Los Angeles News streaming channel + Live Channel 4 newscasts and streaming content + Breaking news live coverage of news briefings and other urgent news events in the LA area + Live streams and live coverage of car chases + Dedicated video page with the latest video feed NBC4 INVESTIGATIONS & MORE + Exclusive NBC4 I-Team stories that get results + NBC4 Responds reports that solve your consumer problems + Sports news from NBC Sports Regional Sports Networks + Business news, finance news and stock market news from CNBC + Entertainment news from E! Online and Access + Lifestyle and entertainment news from NBC TODAY show The NBC Los Angeles news and weather app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information. Your Privacy Choices: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo?brandA=Owned_Stations&intake=NBC_Southern_California/ CA Notice: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act?intake=NBC_Southern_California

apps.title: Bundle News: Breaking & Local
apps.description: Bundle is the most comprehensive and top-rated free news aggregator that brings together all the latest news you need to know throughout the day. With Bundle, you have everything you shouldn't miss at your fingertips, featuring top headlines, breaking news, and a multitude of sources across different interest areas such as the stock market, science and technology, finance, sports, and politics. • My Bundle - Ready to be added to your personal collection for free from over 10,000 news sources, online publishers, magazines, newspapers, opinion pieces, and blogs from 18 different countries. Stay informed and inspired by leading publications such as The Guardian, TIME, The New York Times, Business Insider, Bloomberg, Mashable, and more! • Breaking news – With Bundle, you receive instant notifications for the day's most important developments and standout headlines, ensuring you stay informed before anyone else in a refined, accurate, and unbiased manner. • Save time by summarizing news – Utilize Bundle AI, the productive artificial intelligence developed by Bundle, to summarize news content with just one touch. Instead of reading the entire news, you can quickly get to the most important points. • Escape clickbait headlines – Bundle AI organizes deceptive and non-informative news headlines used by some outlets to gain more clicks, making the headlines more understandable for users. • Unique search feature – Bundle provides instant results based on the keywords you search for. Easily search through all news, headlines, authors, and more. • Reader Mode – If ads on the page of the media outlet you follow distract you, you can focus solely on content by switching to Reader Mode. • Offline Mode – Whether you're on the subway or in a dead zone, you can continue reading all the content loaded into your news feed even if your connection is lost. • Latest news – Bundle delivers the latest news to users instantly. With Bundle, you'll be the first to know the most popular and important news from various categories such as technology, sports, politics, economy, and science, tailored to your interests. • The world at your fingertips – Read news and content from 18 different countries, including the UK, France, Germany, and worldwide, to stay informed about local agendas. • Go beyond the agenda – With Hot Bundle, featuring the daily selections of Bundle editors, you access the most engaging, inspiring, and mind-opening content. • Don't lose, save it – If you can't find time to read a piece of news immediately, save it and read it at your convenience. • Easy to use, hard to let go – With Bundle's award-winning design and user-friendly interface, you can easily access the news you want and glance through all of it at once. If your internet quota is limited, you can turn off news images or use the dark theme option if white light strains your eyes. Log in with your social media account to synchronize your saved news and followed sources across all your devices. Terms of Use and Privacy Agreement: https://www.bundletheworld.com/mobileapp/termsofuse/en In addition to all of this, you can follow all developments related to both current events and Bundle on our Facebook, Instagram, and X accounts! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bundlenews/ X: https://twitter.com/bundleapp/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bundlehaber/ We would be delighted to hear any suggestions, comments, and questions you may have about Bundle: You can always reach us through the "Settings>Send Feedback" section in the app and at support@bundlenews.co. For more information, you can visit our website: www.bundle.app/en

apps.title: NBC 4 New York: News & Weather
apps.description: The NBC 4 New York news and weather app connects you with local news, local weather and a free, 24/7 streaming news channel. Free to download and to use, the app delivers NYC breaking news alerts and weather alerts for your location that can be customized and easily managed in the app settings. The app gives you access to New York local news from the award-winning NBC 4 New York news team, covering the issues and concerns most important to Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, Staten Island, Long Island, New Jersey and Connecticut residents. The Storm Team 4 weather team delivers accurate local forecasts that keep app users safe and informed while on the go. Access a powerful weather radar and customize the weather screen based on your preferences. The NBC 4 New York local app helps you stay informed with the following features: New York & Tri-State Area Weather + Customizable weather home screen with weather modules you can rearrange + Upgraded location hub to add new locations and set up weather alerts + Live StormTracker 4 weather radar with exclusive features and data + 10-day forecasts for your New York region + Hourly forecasts featuring a customizable graph + NYC local weather maps and radar + NYC local weather forecast data that includes UV index, air quality and other live weather conditions + Weather alerts for every location you save in the app + Weather closings for NYC and tri-state area schools + Weather news videos from your local meteorologists New York News Alerts + Alerts for NY local news, national headlines and world news that can be personalized and managed in the app settings + Top news of the day, covering breaking news, politics, weather and urgent product recalls + Latest news feed that shows all articles and videos published in reverse chronological order + Alerts center that shows you the most urgent NYC stories of the day that you might’ve missed if you didn’t click on push notifications +Trending section where you can discover daily, buzz-worthy topics in NY local news and pop culture NBC New York News 24/7 Streaming Channel + Free 24/7 NBC NY news streaming channel + Live NBC 4 New York newscasts + Breaking news live coverage of news briefings and other urgent news events in NYC + Entertainment and lifestyle videos from Access, Open House, New York Live, In the Wings and George to the Rescue + Dedicated video page with the latest video feed Create an NBC New York Account + Save articles and videos to view later + Sync preferences and newsletter subscriptions across NBC platforms NBC New York I-Team Investigations & More + Investigative stories from local and award-winning NYC journalists + Consumer reports from “Better Get Baquero” + Sports news from NBC Sports Regional Sports Networks + Business news, finance news and stock market news from CNBC + Entertainment and celebrity news from E! Online and Access + Lifestyle and entertainment news from NBC TODAY show NBC 4 New York is the flagship station of the NBCUniversal Local division of NBCUniversal, serving the New York tri-state area for more than 75 years. The team of journalists includes the NBC 4 I-Team, New York’s largest televised investigative reporting unit, Better Get Baquero, which has recovered more than $9 million for tri-State consumers and Storm Team 4, certified by WeatheRate for delivering the tri-state’s most accurate local weather forecast using cutting-edge technology such as Storm Tracker 4, a high-frequency S-Band dual polarization fixed Doppler weather radar. The NBC 4 New York news and weather app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software, which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information. Your Privacy Choices: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo?brandA=Owned_Stations&intake=NBC_New_York/ CA Notice: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act?intake=NBC_New_York

apps.title: Indian Express News + Epaper
apps.description: For over 90 years, The Indian Express has been read by those who have their own unique point of view of looking at things. With coverage based on comprehensive analysis, and with fearless reporting, we empower our readers with the truth behind every matter. We go the whole length to get to the crux of every issue. And we don't just stop there, but ferret out every detail that brings out the how, why, where and what next of the subject. So, our readers can formulate their own stands on issues in a bias-free manner. We are the Journalism of Courage. Get on-the-go access to breaking news, India news, live coverage, photos, videos and more. The Indian Express is your one-stop solution for news on the go. Stay updated with Entertainment news, Tech news, Gadgets news, India news, Politics news, Sports news, Cricket news and Bollywood news. Get live news coverage on major events including sports, reviews, cricket and more. Our revamped home feed gives you instant access to the latest news with an aggregated news experience across your most loved topics. This leads to better content discovery and performance, and also enhances the overall user experience on the Indian Express app through a clean, seamless and ad-free interface. The key features of the Indian Express App are - 1. Collated news experience - The new home screen gives you the best news across your favourite sections i.e Latest news, Opinions, Audio, Videos, Technology, Entertainment and Sports in India and across the globe 2. Dedicated Audio/Video and Photos section - Experience the best podcasts, videos and photos from our rich library 3. ePaper - Get instant access to our e-newspapers and magazines 4. Offline Reading - Bookmark stories and read news in offline mode even without internet 5. Swipe for Next - Swiping left & right from the article page gives you instant access to other stories for a seamlessly reading experience 6. Share - Share stories with your friends using Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Email & more! Indian Express is one of the largest english newspaper website in India, with an expanding repertoire and rapidly expanding presence. Write to us & share your feedback & suggestions at appsupport@indianexpress.com By using this app, you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ Privacy Policy: https://indianexpress.com/privacy-policy/ Terms & Conditions: https://indianexpress.com/terms-and-conditions/

apps.title: Apple Podcasts
apps.description: Discover podcasts that entertain, inform, and inspire. Get recommendations curated by Apple Podcasts editors and dive deep into what interests you most. Seamlessly sync your shows across Apple devices. Features: • Explore new shows with personalized recommendations. • Find trending shows and episodes by category with Top Charts. • Find the best of what’s new and popular in podcasting with curated collections from Apple editors. • Follow and save your favorite shows to your library. • Use playback controls to build and manage your queue, control playback speed, and set sleep timers. • Hear voices in episodes more clearly with Enhance Dialogue. • Add your favorite categories to find shows that map to your unique tastes. • Access subscriber-only content, from the biggest names to the top independents. • Connect subscriptions to access shows from Apple Music, Apple News, and other top apps. • Read along with a transcript as your episode plays. • Share a specific moment in an episode from the transcript. • Get new episode notifications from shows you follow. • Download episodes and listen offline. • Pick up where you left off with seamless syncing across your Apple devices. • Listen on-the-go with CarPlay and Apple Watch. • Use customizable widgets to listen with just one tap. Availability and features vary by country and region, plan, or device. https://support.apple.com/HT204411 Apple Podcasts app Terms and Conditions can be found at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/
